name: Pepper Bell must be grilled
description:
Game for Ludumdare43

Goal

  • gril a target, throw player to a bbq. 

 Control (Prefer 4 GamePad)

  • Analog axis : Walk
  • RB : Toggle Run
  • Y : Throw player (when carry someone)
  • X : Tackle 
  • B: Pause
  • A (rapidly press): Break free from holding by someone
